author: Timothy Linward
description:
Bandai’s upcoming Gundam Trading Card game has a red hot IP - but does it have the chops to stand tall in the crowded TCG market? Team Wargamer managed to squeeze in a short test during the recent UK Games Expo - here's what we think.

Continue reading The Gundam Trading Card game plays like a mix-tape of other popular TCGs
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best trading card games, All MTG sets in order, All Pokémon sets in order
title: The Gundam Trading Card game plays like a mix-tape of other popular TCGs

author: Callum Self
description:
When Journey Together was released, I was a huge fan. I still am, in all honesty, but the ever-turning wheel of new Pokémon cards means I can’t spend too much time focusing on the latest set. However, the return of the Unova region and its iconic ‘Mons are just too beautiful to pass up - so I’m skipping Destined Rivals entirely and going full steam on the Pokémon Black Bolt and White Flare set.

Continue reading Forget Pokémon Destined Rivals, I'm going all in on Black Bolt and White Flare
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon se
title: Forget Pokémon Destined Rivals, I'm going all in on Black Bolt and White Flare

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Final Fantasy Magic set is just around the corner, and with so many players hyped for the new cards, poring over them for hours, it only makes sense some have found ways to break them utterly.

Continue reading Six gamebreaking infinite combos in the MTG Final Fantasy set

title: Six gamebreaking infinite combos in the MTG Final Fantasy set

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Wizards of the Coast shared two job openings for senior Dungeons and Dragons designers on June 3, implying that new leadership will soon be taking charge of the game’s direction. One listing on Hasbro’s website calls for a “Head of Game Ecosystem”, while another is for a “Principal Game Designer”. This is the first update we’ve had on D&D’s leadership since Jeremy Crawford and Chris Perkins, the previous designers at the top of the chain, retired in Spring.

Continue reading Wizards of the Coast is hiring the next supreme leaders of DnD design
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Wizards of the Coast is hiring the next supreme leaders of DnD design

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Three new detachments have just entered the Warhammer 40k arena, introducing new ways to build Tyranid, Dark Angels, and Chaos Space Marine armies. The Tyranids Subterranean Assault is all about tunnelling terrors; the Dark Angels’ Wrath of the Rock pairs up the lightning fast Ravenwing with the rock solid Deathwing; and the Chaos Space Marines’ Cabal of Chaos revels in the power of the warp. Here's why they're cool.

Continue reading First look at Warhammer 40k's new Chaos, Tyranids, and Dark Angels detachments
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: First look at Warhammer 40k's new Chaos, Tyranids, and Dark Angels detachments

author: Mollie Russell
description:
There are many board games about surviving nightmarish alien encounters on distant spaceships. Heck, some of them even have an official Alien license. However, none are quite as entertaining as the co-op scifi horror board game Nemesis: Lockdown. If this tabletop title has somehow flown under your radar, now is a great time for discovery, as Nemesis: Lockdown is currently 30% off at Amazon US.

Continue reading Our all-time favorite alien survival board game is 30% off at Amazon
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best board games for adults, Best strategy board games
title: Our all-time favorite alien survival board game is 30% off at Amazon
